mapper.select: SELECT A.CAL_NUM, A.BLOG_ID, A.CAL_TITLE, TO_CHAR(A.CAL_START,'YYYY-MM-DD HH24:MI:SS') AS CAL_START, TO_CHAR(A.CAL_END,'YYYY-MM-DD HH24:MI:SS') AS CAL_END, A.CAL_CONTENT, A.CAL_COLOR FROM TB_BLOG_CALENDAR A,TB_BLOG B WHERE A.BLOG_ID= B.BLOG_ID AND B.BLOGER_ID=#{sessionId}
mapper.insert:
SELECT fn_create_num(to_char(sysdate,'yymmdd'), 'TB_BLOG_CALENDAR', 'CAL_NUM', UPPER('BCAL')) FROM DUAL
INSERT INTO TB_BLOG_CALENDAR ( CAL_NUM, BLOG_ID, CAL_TITLE, CAL_START, CAL_END, CAL_CONTENT, CAL_COLOR ) VALUES ( #{calNum}, #{blogId}, #{calTitle}, TO_DATE(#{calStart},'YYYY-MM-DD HH24:MI'), TO_DATE(#{calEnd},'YYYY-MM-DD HH24:MI'), #{calContent}, #{calColor} )
mapper.update: UPDATE TB_BLOG_CALENDAR SET CAL_TITLE = #{calTitle}, CAL_START = TO_DATE(#{calStart},'YYYY-MM-DD HH24:MI'), CAL_END = TO_DATE(#{calEnd},'YYYY-MM-DD HH24:MI'), CAL_CONTENT = #{calContent}, CAL_COLOR = #{calColor} WHERE CAL_NUM = #{calNum}
